StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDistrictsByParentAndType]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @intParentOrgID int, @strOrgType varchar(3) = NULL ) AS
-- From sp_GetChildOrgs SELECT RO.ORGANIZATION_ID, RO.SHORT_NAME, RO.NAME, RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON ( RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AND OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @intParentOrgID AND ( (@strOrgType = 'OSS' AND RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'OSS') OR (COALESCE(@strOrgType, SPACE(0)) != 'OSS' AND RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE != 'OSS') ) AND RO.ISOPEN = 'Y' ) ORDER BY RO.SHORT_NAME --ORDER BY RO.ORGANIZATION_ID
